§ Korea 2018

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

I visited Korea in 2018, in late August and early September.
This was my first trip to Korea.

(I visited Korea again many many times after this first trip.)

I came to learn about Korea.
I came to learn about the startup and tech scene in Korea.
I came to learn about the eSports scene in Korea.
I came to learn about the video influencer scene in Korea.

I enjoyed this trip to Korea.
